001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathExpression;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathExpression.ResultType;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library.FnData;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.impl.DefaultIndex;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
019
020import java.util.ArrayList;
021import java.util.List;
022import java.util.regex.Matcher;
023import java.util.regex.Pattern;
024import java.util.stream.Collectors;
025
026import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
027import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
028
029public interface IIndex {
030
031  /**
032   * Construct a new index using the provided key field components to generate
033   * keys.
034   *
035   * @param keyFields
036   *          the key field components to use to generate keys by default
037   * @return the new index
038   */
039  @NonNull
040  static IIndex newInstance(@NonNull List<? extends IKeyField> keyFields) {
041    return new DefaultIndex(keyFields);
042  }
043
044  /**
045   * Check if a key contains information other than {@code null} Strings.
046   *
047   * @param key
048   *          the key to check
049   * @return {@code true} if the series of key values contains only {@code null}
050   *         values, or {@code false} otherwise
051   */
052  static boolean isAllNulls(@NonNull Iterable<String> key) {
053    for (String value : key) {
054      if (value != null) {
055        return false; // NOPMD readability
056      }
057    }
058    return true;
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Retrieve the key field components used to generate a key for this index.
063   *
064   * @return the key field components
065   */
066  @NonNull
067  List<IKeyField> getKeyFields();
068
069  /**
070   * Store the provided item in the index using the index's key field components
071   * to generate the key.
072   *
073   * @param item
074   *          the item to store in the index
075   * @param dynamicContext
076   *          the Metapath evaluation context
077   * @return the previous item stored in the index, or {@code null} otherwise
078   */
079  @Nullable
080  default INodeItem put(@NonNull INodeItem item, @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
081    List<String> key = toKey(item, getKeyFields(), dynamicContext);
082    return put(item, key);
083  }
084
085  /**
086   * Store the provided item using the provided key.
087   *
088   * @param item
089   *          the item to store
090   * @param key
091   *          the key to store the item with
092   * @return the previous item stored in the index using the key, or {@code null}
093   *         otherwise
094   */
095  @Nullable
096  INodeItem put(@NonNull INodeItem item, @NonNull List<String> key);
097
098  /**
099   * Retrieve the item from the index that matches the key generated by evaluating
100   * the index's default key field components against the provided item.
101   *
102   * @param item
103   *          the item to store in the index
104   * @param dynamicContext
105   *          the Metapath evaluation context
106   * @return the previous item stored in the index, or {@code null} otherwise
107   */
108  @Nullable
109  default INodeItem get(@NonNull INodeItem item, @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
110    List<String> key = toKey(item, getKeyFields(), dynamicContext);
111    return get(key);
112  }
113
114  /**
115   * Retrieve the item from the index that matches the provided key.
116   *
117   * @param key
118   *          the key to use for lookup
119   * @return the item with the matching key or {@code null} if no matching item
120   *         was found
121   */
122  INodeItem get(List<String> key);
123
124  /**
125   * Construct a key by evaluating the provided key field components against the
126   * provided item.
127   *
128   * @param item
129   *          the item to generate the key from
130   * @param keyFields
131   *          the key field components used to generate the key
132   * @param dynamicContext
133   *          the Metapath evaluation context
134   * @return a new key
135   */
136  @NonNull
137  static List<String> toKey(@NonNull INodeItem item, @NonNull List<? extends IKeyField> keyFields,
138      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
139    return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(
140        ObjectUtils.notNull(keyFields.stream()
141            .map(keyField -> {
142              assert keyField != null;
143              return buildKeyItem(item, keyField, dynamicContext);
144            })
145            .collect(Collectors.toCollection(ArrayList::new))));
146  }
147
148  /**
149   * Evaluates the provided key field component against the item to generate a key
150   * value.
151   *
152   * @param item
153   *          the item to generate the key value from
154   * @param keyField
155   *          the key field component used to generate the key value
156   * @param dynamicContext
157   *          the Metapath evaluation context
158   * @return the key value or {@code null} if the evaluation resulted in no value
159   */
160  @Nullable
161  private static String buildKeyItem(
162      @NonNull INodeItem item,
163      @NonNull IKeyField keyField,
164      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
165    MetapathExpression keyMetapath = keyField.getTargetMetapath();
166
167    IItem keyItem;
168    try {
169      keyItem = keyMetapath.evaluateAs(item, ResultType.ITEM, dynamicContext);
170    } catch (InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
171      throw new MetapathException("Key path did not result in a single item", ex);
172    }
173
174    String keyValue = null;
175    if (keyItem != null) {
176      keyValue = FnData.fnDataItem(keyItem).asString();
177      assert keyValue != null;
178      Pattern pattern = keyField.getPattern();
179      if (pattern != null) {
180        keyValue = applyPattern(keyMetapath, keyValue, pattern);
181      }
182    } // empty key
183    return keyValue;
184  }
185
186  /**
187   * Apply the key value pattern, if configured, to generate the final key value.
188   *
189   * @param keyItem
190   *          the node item used to form the key field
191   * @param pattern
192   *          the key field pattern configuration from the constraint
193   * @param keyValue
194   *          the current key value
195   * @return the final key value
196   */
197  private static String applyPattern(@NonNull MetapathExpression keyMetapath, @NonNull String keyValue,
198      @NonNull Pattern pattern) {
199    Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher(keyValue);
200    if (!matcher.matches()) {
201      throw new MetapathException(
202          String.format("Key field declares the pattern '%s' which does not match the value '%s' of node '%s'",
203              pattern.pattern(), keyValue, keyMetapath));
204    }
205
206    if (matcher.groupCount() != 1) {
207      throw new MetapathException(String.format(
208          "The first group was not a match for value '%s' of node '%s' for key field pattern '%s'",
209          keyValue, keyMetapath, pattern.pattern()));
210    }
211    return matcher.group(1);
212  }
213}
